messages.content:
i'm about to send a follow up email to a bunch of accelerator program administrators who came to our wellbeing for impact panel last week. Anything I can do to improve this email and ensure people add wellbeing practices to our library?
Salam {name}!
Last week we had a wonderful call with our peers working on entrepreneurship training discussing wellbeing and its relationship to impact. You can read a summary of our call with our wonderful panelists and watch the video here. 
We're gathering wellbeing and engagement practices to share with the broader community and we invite you and the participants in your organization and programs to add to and see the activities we're collecting here. We plan to use it to share what you find inspiring on our social media accounts and on our platform tagging the wonderful community members who are sharing.
Before I go, I wanted to remind folk that we have a training of trainers program for Lebanese ISOs( Innovation Support Organizations). We will be focusing on building a community of practice around purpose-driven work, wellbeing and flow - all skills needed for entrepreneurs and the support ecosystem. If you'd like to join, or know someone who would, today is the deadline to apply!

Hi there! Your email is well-written and clear about the goal. However, I do have a few suggestions to make it a bit more engaging and persuasive:

1. **Personalization**: Include personal details or experiences from the call. This will make the email more memorable and engaging.

2. **Action-oriented language**: Make the call-to-action (CTA) stronger by using more persuasive, action-oriented language.

3. **Benefits and outcomes**: Emphasize the benefits of participating in your initiative more directly, such as personal growth, contributing to the community, or networking opportunities.

4. **Urgency**: For the deadline, try to create a sense of urgency so that they take action quickly.

Here is the revised email:

---

Subject: Action Required: Help Shape Our Wellbeing Library & Join the Lebanese ISO Training!

Dear {Name},

I hope this message finds you well. It was great having you at our 'Wellbeing for Impact' panel last week. I thoroughly enjoyed the discussions we had and your insights about entrepreneurship training were invaluable.

I'm reaching out to invite you to contribute to our growing library of wellbeing and engagement practices. This is a fantastic opportunity to share your unique insights and methods with a broader community of entrepreneurship educators. Not only will this amplify the reach of your methods, but it will also foster a collaborative environment for all of us in this field.

You can submit your wellbeing practices here. All practices you share will be acknowledged on our social media accounts and our platform, thereby attributing the wonderful community members who contribute.

Moreover, I would like to remind you about our Training of Trainers program tailored for Lebanese Innovation Support Organizations (ISOs). This program is designed to build a thriving community around purpose-driven work, wellbeing, and flow - essential skills for entrepreneurs and their support ecosystems. I think you or some of your colleagues would find this opportunity invaluable. If you're interested, please apply today - the application deadline is just around the corner!

We're excited to grow and learn together in this journey. Your participation will be greatly appreciated and will surely enrich our collective knowledge and impact. Looking forward to your contributions.

Best Regards,

[Your Name]

---

I hope this helps! Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist with.
